chapter.title: Introduction to the Mobicents Arquillian Sip Servlets Extension
chapter.para: Arquillian is a container-oriented test framework. It picks up where unit tests leave off, targeting the integration of application code inside a real runtime environment. Just as Java EE 5 simplified the server programming model by providing declarative services for POJOs, Arquillian equips tests with container lifecycle management and enrichment. You can learn more on Arquillian here Arquillian Home
With the Mobicents Sip Servlets Arquillian framework Mobicents team brings the power and benefits of the Arquillian framework to the Sip Servlets world.

Integration testing for Sip Servlets now becomes as much simple or as much complicated as you wish. No need to extend and use complex classes and structures anymore in order to test your Sip Servlets application. But on the other hand, you can go ahead and do it if you need.

With the Mobicents Arquillian testing framework, you have the choice to work with a standard environment that will fit most of the cases, or go ahead and parameterize the testing environment as much as you wish in order to meet your needs.

formalpara.title: Container Support
MSS Arquillian Framework Parts
formalpara.para: The Mobicents Arquillian testing framework consists of the following parts

listitem.para: The embedded Mobicents Sip Servlets container that the application will run.

A sip client to interact with your application. For this we are using SipUnit but you are free to use any sip client fits your needs. We are collaborating with CafeSip developers on the SipUnit project in order to provide new features, fix bugs etc.
